title: Adorable kitten with dwarfism lies on his back and kicks like a bunny
text:
This is the heartwarming moment an adorable dwarf kitten lay on his back and kicked his legs up and down like a rabbit.

Eight-week-old Potato is a rescue kitten, and together with his brother Gravy, the only survivor of a litter of five.

Potato, who has dwarfism and is smaller than normal-sized kittens, is a guest at Seattle Humane, an independent and not-for-profit animal rescue center in Bellevue, Washington.

On October 23, Potato was filmed lying on his back and kicking up with his back paws in an adorable video.

As his legs move, so does his adorably fluffy tail, which swings from side to side.

At one point, one of the rescue center's workers reaches down to tickle Potato's stomach.

Eight-week-old Potato is a rescue kitten, and lay on his back and kicked like a bunny in this adorable video

Potato has dwarfism and is smaller than normal-sized kittens. He is a guest at Seattle Humane, an independent and not-for-profit animal rescue centre in Bellevue, Washington

Potato is a rescue kitten, and together with his brother Gravy, the only survivor of a litter of five

This only make the fluffy feline kick more and his whole body seems to move along with his legs.

Eyes wide, the kitten looks impatient as he frantically kicks his legs up and down in the clip.

The video has been viewed more than 200,000 times on social media.
description: Potato, who has dwarfism and is smaller than normal-sized kittens, is a guest at Seattle Humane, an independent and not-for-profit animal rescue centre in Bellevue, Washington.
